nodes.text: The ID-75 Heavy Mining Droid was a model of mining droid that was created by the Gran cyborg Ayor-v9, who used them on Hoth during the Galactic War and considered his droids to be his "family."
The ID-75 Heavy Mining Droid appears a type of enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Digging His Own Grave" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
